cmfd_slepc_solver.F90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 module cmfd_slepc_solver
00002 
00003   use cmfd_loss_operator, only: loss_operator,init_M_operator,                 &
00004  &                        build_loss_matrix,destroy_M_operator
00005   use cmfd_prod_operator, only: prod_operator,init_F_operator,                 &
00006  &                        build_prod_matrix,destroy_F_operator
00007 
00008   implicit none
00009 
00010 #include <finclude/petsc.h90>
00011 #include <finclude/slepcsys.h>
00012 #include <finclude/slepceps.h>
00013 
00014   type(loss_operator) :: loss
00015   type(prod_operator) :: prod
00016 
00017   Vec         :: phi               ! eigenvector
00018   EPS         :: eps               ! slepc eigenvalue object
00019   ST          :: st                ! slepc spectral trans object
00020   KSP         :: ksp               ! linear solver object
00021   PC          :: pc                ! preconditioner object
00022   integer     :: ierr              ! error flag
00023   real(8)     :: keff              ! the converged eigenvalue
00024 
00025 contains
00026 
00027 !===============================================================================
00028 ! CMFD_SLEPC_EXECUTE
00029 !===============================================================================
00030 
00031   subroutine cmfd_slepc_execute()
00032 
00033     ! initialize data
00034     call init_data()
00035 
00036     ! initialize solver
00037     call init_solver()
00038 
00039     ! build operators
00040     call build_loss_matrix(loss)
00041     call build_prod_matrix(prod)
00042 
00043     ! set operators to EPS object
00044     call EPSSetOperators(eps,prod%F,loss%M,ierr)
00045 
00046     ! set EPS options
00047     call EPSSetFromOptions(eps,ierr)
00048 
00049     ! solve the system
00050     call EPSSolve(eps,ierr)
00051 
00052     ! extracts results to cmfd object
00053     call extract_results()
00054 
00055     ! deallocate all slepc data
00056     call finalize()
00057 
00058   end subroutine cmfd_slepc_execute
00059 
00060 !===============================================================================
00061 ! INIT_DATA allocates matrices vectors for CMFD solution
00062 !===============================================================================
00063 
00064   subroutine init_data()
00065 
00066     integer :: n ! problem size
00067 
00068     ! set up matrices
00069     call init_M_operator(loss)
00070     call init_F_operator(prod)
00071 
00072     ! get problem size
00073     n = loss%n
00074 
00075     ! set up eigenvector
00076     call VecCreateMPI(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,PETSC_DECIDE,n,phi,ierr)
00077 
00078   end subroutine init_data
00079 
00080 !===============================================================================
00081 ! INIT_SOLVER
00082 !===============================================================================
00083 
00084   subroutine init_solver()
00085 
00086     character(LEN=20) :: epstype,sttype,ksptype,pctype
00087 
00088     ! create EPS Object
00089     call EPSCreate(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,eps,ierr)
00090     call EPSSetProblemType(eps,EPS_GNHEP,ierr)
00091     call EPSSetType(eps,EPSPOWER,ierr)
00092     call EPSSetWhichEigenpairs(eps,EPS_LARGEST_MAGNITUDE,ierr)
00093  
00094     ! get ST, KSP and PC objects
00095     call EPSGetST(eps,st,ierr)
00096     call STGetKSP(st,ksp,ierr)
00097     call KSPGetPC(ksp,pc,ierr)
00098 
00099     ! set GMRES default
00100     call KSPSetType(ksp,KSPGMRES,ierr)
00101 
00102     ! set precursor type
00103     call PCSetType(pc,PCBJACOBI,ierr)
00104     call PCSetFromOptions(pc,ierr)
00105 
00106     ! get all types and print
00107     call EPSGetType(eps,epstype,ierr)
00108     call STGetType(st,sttype,ierr)
00109     call KSPGetType(ksp,ksptype,ierr)
00110     call PCGetType(pc,pctype,ierr)
00111 
00112     ! display information to user
00113 !   write(*,'(/,A)') 'SLEPC SOLVER OPTIONS:'
00114 !   write(*,*) '---------------------'
00115 !   write(*,*) 'EPS TYPE IS: ',epstype
00116 !   write(*,*) 'ST TYPE IS: ',sttype
00117 !   write(*,*) 'KSP TYPE IS: ',ksptype
00118 !   write(*,*) 'PC TYPE IS: ',pctype
00119 
00120   end subroutine init_solver
00121 
00122 !==============================================================================
00123 ! EXTRACT_RESULTS
00124 !==============================================================================
00125 
00126   subroutine extract_results()
00127 
00128     use global, only: cmfd
00129 
00130     integer              :: n         ! problem size
00131     integer              :: i_eig = 0 ! eigenvalue to extract
00132     integer              :: row_start ! starting row 
00133     integer              :: row_end   ! ending row
00134     real(8),allocatable  :: mybuf(:)  ! temp buffer
00135     PetscViewer          :: viewer    ! petsc output object
00136     PetscScalar, pointer :: phi_v(:)  ! pointer to eigenvector info
00137  
00138     ! get problem size
00139     n = loss%n
00140 
00141     ! also allocate in cmfd object
00142     if (.not. allocated(cmfd%phi)) allocate(cmfd%phi(n))
00143     if (.not. allocated(mybuf)) allocate(mybuf(n))
00144 
00145     ! zero out cmfd object
00146     cmfd%phi = 0.0_8
00147 
00148     ! extract run information
00149     call EPSGetEigenpair(eps,i_eig,keff,PETSC_NULL,phi,PETSC_NULL_OBJECT,ierr)
00150 
00151     ! get ownership range
00152     call VecGetOwnershipRange(phi,row_start,row_end,ierr)
00153 
00154     ! convert petsc phi_object to cmfd_obj
00155     call VecGetArrayF90(phi,phi_v,ierr)
00156     cmfd%phi(row_start+1:row_end) = phi_v
00157     call VecRestoreArrayF90(phi,phi_v,ierr)
00158 
00159     ! save eigenvalue
00160     cmfd%keff = keff
00161 
00162     ! reduce result to master and re-broadcast
00163     mybuf = 0.0_8
00164     call MPI_ALLREDUCE(cmfd%phi,mybuf,n,MPI_REAL8,MPI_SUM,MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00165 
00166     ! move buffer to object and deallocate
00167     cmfd%phi = mybuf
00168     if(allocated(mybuf)) deallocate(mybuf)
00169 
00170     ! write out results
00171 !   call PetscViewerBinaryOpen(PETSC_COMM_SELF,trim(path_input)//'fluxvec.bin' &
00172 !  &     ,FILE_MODE_WRITE,viewer,ierr)
00173 !   call VecView(phi,viewer,ierr)
00174 !   call PetscViewerDestroy(viewer,ierr)
00175 
00176   end subroutine extract_results
00177 
00178 !==============================================================================
00179 ! FINALIZE
00180 !==============================================================================
00181 
00182   subroutine finalize()
00183 
00184     ! finalize data objects
00185     call destroy_M_operator(loss)
00186     call destroy_F_operator(prod)
00187     call VecDestroy(phi,ierr)
00188 
00189     ! finalize solver objects
00190     call EPSDestroy(eps,ierr)
00191 
00192   end subroutine finalize
00193 
00194 end module cmfd_slepc_solver
